infos.value: What could he mean by that?
Has he employed monsters in his invasion of Leonis? Or could he mean...?
Sadali gave Muraga some sort of magic armor.
He gifted the same magic armor to us when forming an alliance with Fennes.
Normally we would not accept such a suspicious gift. But...
One of the soldiers did try it on, and...
He began lashing out violently, not unlike how a monster would.
Just what kind of magic was in that armor?
That is what happens when someone lacking strength wears the armor, he said.
It appeared to convert rage into power, a contrivance which we of Hourne had no need for.
We decided to get rid of it.
So Muraga could also be wearing that armor...
When the soldier began acting like a monster, it took the collective efforts of «Solidus» and «Nitor» to bring him down.
I fear for our comrades. Let us hurry and join with the others.
Yes, that sounds like a good idea.
